**User:**
Hey, I've been thinking about mining VRSC and I was wondering, how can I mine VRSC on my computer using VerusBox?

**AI Assistant:**
Actually, you can't mine VRSC on your computer using VerusBox. VerusBox is designed for mobile devices, specifically Android, and allows you to mine VRSC on your phone, not on your computer. If you're interested in mining VRSC, you'll need to explore other options.
